com.github.dm.jrt.android.core.runner

Class AndroidRunners

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.android.core.runner.AndroidRunners

  • public class AndroidRunners
extends Object
    Utility class for creating and sharing runner instances, employing specific Android classes.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 09/28/2014.

    • Method Summary

      • taskRunner

        @NotNull
public static Runner taskRunner()
        Returns a runner employing async tasks.

        Beware of the caveats of using AsyncTasks especially on some platform versions.

        Returns:
        the runner instance.

      • taskRunner

        @NotNull
public static Runner taskRunner(@Nullable
                                         Executor executor)
        Returns a runner employing async tasks running on the specified executor.

        Beware of the caveats of using AsyncTasks especially on some platform versions.

        Note also that the executor instance will be ignored on platforms with API level lower than 11.

        Parameters:
        executor - the executor.
        Returns:
        the runner instance.
